The audio on this podcast is Greg's intro and outro to the film, done in the classic Smartest Man style. Dust off the VHS player and enjoy the bromance on your own for the full Greg Proops Film Club experience!

episodes.author: Greg Proops
episodes.summary:
The Smartest Man in the World now has his own app! Stream and download episodes directly to your mobile device, mark favorites and access exclusive bonus content not available anywhere else. The Proopcast App is iOS and Android compatible, so visit the iTunes App Store or the Android Marketplace to purchase -- or just follow the links on proopcast.com.

(App users: to access the first bonus mini-episode, click "Extras," "View All Extras," then "Bonus Content.")
